song.title: Oceans
song.lyrics:
Hold on to the thread The currents will shift Glide me towards you Know something's left And we're all allowed to dream of the next Oh the next... time we touch...
You don't have to stray Two oceans away Waves roll in my thoughts Hold tight the ring... The sea will rise... Please stand by the shore...
I will be... I will be... There once more...
